cellularAutomata.util
Class Fonts

java.lang.Object
  cellularAutomata.util.Fonts

public class Fonts
extends java.lang.Object

Creates fonts suitable for the CA graphics.

Author:
David Bahr

          Creates a set of fonts that are sized relative to the fonts of the JPanel class.

Constructor Detail

Fonts

public Fonts()
Creates a set of fonts that are sized relative to the fonts of the JPanel class.

Fonts

public Fonts(javax.swing.JComponent component)
Creates a set of fonts that are sized relative to the fonts of the given component. If the supplied component is null, then the fonts are sized relative to the fonts of the JPanel class.

Parameters:
component - The component relative to which the fonts are sized. May be null.
